body: Hello!  My name is Bret Ladenburg and I'm an aspiring web dev who is currently based in Seattle, WA.  After a successful career in Aquatics, I decided that it was time for a change and to do something which let me express a more creative side of myself.  To that end, I joined Code Fellows in early March and the rest is history.
Hello!  My name is Brandon Holderman, I wish this could have been a PantsShare app

teamMember: David Lim, CEO & Founder PantsShare TM
body: Hello!  My name is David, i'm a student at Code Fellows and I am learning software develpment to create my dream app Pants Share.
I invested in SurpriseMe and PantsShare because I believe in the power of dreams!
